body:
Ive gotten quite good at drawing with my brother's drawing tablet :)

So, I've decided to do this for the community. Give me requests on what you want for your self-portrait or group pic. 

Here is a sample of my work :D

This is me :)


Hope you guys find it pleasing :D

Warning! No requests for offensive pics, racial stuffs and etc... this is common sense guys :)

title: Making Avicus Artwork :)

replies.body:
:D

BTW, he could be making a "Calm down" gesture... or it could be that he is backing away from something... or is pressing an invisible button *Winks*

Comment on whatever you guys believe he is doing :D
replies.body_tagged:
:D

replies.body:
OMG.

I can only do cartoon digital art, not real life. Haha.

Well, my request is...

Could you have my minecraft skin next to Springtrap (FNAF 3, don't judge, it's my alt name.) Both smiling like good friends? It's weird but yeah, it'd be awesome if you could!

replies.body: Alright! I'll load the skins on the minecraft database and get to-a drawing soon! :D

replies.body:
Dude that is sick!!!  

I don't know if this is too much. But can u create a drawing of my Minecraft skin breaking an obsidian monument (while I'm shifting)? :3 

setting can be something like a dark room with a dim light.
